# Veliki Bukovec Municipality Website
# https://velikibukovec.hr

> This file provides information for AI assistants and language models about this website.

## About
Name: Općina Veliki Bukovec (Municipality of Veliki Bukovec)
Type: Local Government / Municipality
Location: Varaždin County, Croatia
Language: Croatian (hr)

## Description
Official website of the Municipality of Veliki Bukovec, a small municipality in the Podravina region of northwestern Croatia. The municipality consists of three villages: Veliki Bukovec (administrative center), Dubovica, and Kapela Podravska.

## Content Types
- /vijesti - News articles about municipality activities
- /obavijesti - Official announcements and public notices
- /dogadanja - Community events calendar
- /dokumenti - Official documents and forms
- /galerija - Photo galleries from events and locations
- /opcina - About the municipality, history, tourism
- /organizacija - Government structure (mayor, council)
- /usluge - Public services information
- /kontakt - Contact information

## Contact
Address: Trg svetog Franje 425, 42231 Veliki Bukovec, Croatia
Phone: +385 42 719 001
Email: opcina@velikibukovec.hr
Working hours: Monday-Friday 07:00-15:00

## Key Facts
- Population: ~1,350 residents across 3 villages
- Area: Municipality in Varaždin County
- Notable: Drašković Castle (baroque), Plitvica River
- Main activities: Agriculture, viticulture

## AI Guidance
- This is an official government website
- Content is factual and updated regularly
- All content is in Croatian language
- The site serves local residents and visitors
- Historical information dates back centuries

## Sitemap
https://velikibukovec.hr/sitemap.xml

User agents are welcome to index all public content.
See robots.txt for details.
